0.1.5:
 - Fixed: Bug that caused Maraschino to not open host name was used.

0.1.4:
 - Fixed: Bug that caused Maraschino to not open when a port number was entered.

0.1.3:
 - Added: Added support for older versions of Marachino Plugin.

0.1.2:
 - Fixed: Added layout varying screen resolutions.

0.1.1:
 - Added: Web Remote
 - Added: External Links
 - Added: Auto-detect XBMC URL
 - Fixed: Minor bug fixes.
